title: Studio Home On Redmonds Marymoor Park! Apply Today!
map_address: 6335 180th PL NE near East Lake Sammamish Parkway
posting_body: Wake up every day to the wild-hearted beauty of the Pacific Northwest – it’s right outside your window at Bell Marymoor Park.
From our free-spirited rooftop deck to the light-filled arboretum, every element is designed to enhance your indoor/outdoor lifestyle.
Roam far in your own backyard when you live next door to Marymoor Park, an immense green playground for recreation and relaxation.
We’re directly on the bike trail and just a few minutes away from Downtown Redmond and East Lake Sammamish.
-Rooftop grilling stations, bar, fireplace and sun-nooks
-Bocce ball, shuffle board, life-sized scrabble and mega jenga
-640 acres of outdoor recreation possibilities at your doorstep
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Pricing and Specials subject to change daily and restrictions may apply.
Please contact leasing agent for details.
Please inquire via our website at <URL>
Equal Housing Opportunity Statement: We are pledged to the letter and spirit of U.S. policy for the achievement of equal housing opportunity throughout the Nation.

We encourage and support an affirmative advertising and marketing program in which there are no barriers to obtaining housing because of race, color, religion, sex, handicap, familial status, or national origin.
